data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Every summer, my family visits the beach in New Jersey. We ____ to ____ a ____ lunch ____ us. We ____ books ____ play ____ beach ____. When ____ weather ____ very ____, ____ go ____ in ____ water. After we swim, we always buy ice cream.
data.partBlankContent: Every summer, my family visits the beach in New Jersey. We li__ to ta__ a pic___ lunch wi__ us. We re__ books a__ play wi__ beach ba___. When t__ weather i_ very h__, w_ go swim____ in t__ water. After we swim, we always buy ice cream.
data.fullContent: Every summer, my family visits the beach in New Jersey. We like to take a picnic lunch with us. We read books and play with beach balls. When the weather is very hot, we go swimming in the water. After we swim, we always buy ice cream.
data.answer: 每年夏天，我的家人都会去新泽西的海滩。我们喜欢带着野餐午餐。我们读书和玩沙滩球。天气很热的时候，我们去水里游泳。我们游泳后，我们总是买冰淇淋。
